::: {.callout-important}
## Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC)

This section contains descriptions of animal care IACUC protocols and related documentation.
:::

::: {.callout-note}
## Purpose

The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) is responsible for overseeing and evaluating all aspects of the institution's animal care and use program. This includes reviewing and approving protocols for animal research, ensuring compliance with federal regulations, and promoting the ethical treatment of animals in research.
:::

::: {.callout-tip}

:::
